prime.gui.managers.ToolTipManager

type
class
implements
prime.core.traits.IDisposable
available in
swf
metadata
:build
'???'
:keep
Class for centralizing the use of tooltips.

Constructor

new(window : prime.gui.core.UIWindow)

Instance Methods

dispose() : Void

hide(?obj : prime.gui.core.UIComponent) : Void

method will hide the tooltip. If 'obj' is given, the method will only hide the tooltip if 'obj' is the current hovered object.

inline isVisible() : Bool

show(obj : prime.gui.core.UIComponent, label : prime.bindable.Bindable<String>) : Void

Method will enable the tooltip for the given obj with the given label. When the tooltip is enabled, it will also start following the mouse.
